huggingface/diffusers

diffusion models for generating images, audio, and 3D with easy pipelines

Related repos

  • open-source diffusion engine for AI image and video generation
  • 3D mesh generation from images using diffusion transformers
  • Collection of PyTorch image models, training scripts, and utilities
  • transformers library for working with machine learning models
  • Extension of Transformers for optimizing and running models on specific hardware
  • LTX-Video, open source code for a model that generates videos from prompts or images using diffusion transformers
  • library for speeding up diffusion models
  • Curated list of video diffusion model projects, papers, and resources for generation, editing, and related tasks
  • Scripts and tools for training and fine-tuning Stable Diffusion models
